    • `ppdiag`, diagnostic tools for temporal Point Processes

Simulate Hawkes process during active state

simulatehp.Rd

Simulate Hawkes process during active state (including all the history), a helper function for "simulationmmhp"

simulatehp(hp, start = 0, end = NULL, history = 0, n = NULL, seed = NULL)

Arguments

hp

hawkes process object, including parameters in list type (lambda0, alpha, beta, events)
start

start time of the Hawkes process
end

end time of the Hawkes process
history

the past event times
n

number of events
seed

seed for simulation

Value

simulated Hawkes Process

Examples

hp_obj <- hp(lambda0 = 0.1,alpha = 0.45,beta = 0.5)
simulatehp(hp_obj,start = 0, end = 100)

#> Simulating up to endtime. To simulate n events specify n.
